meanings.definition: The quality or state of being easily remembered or recalled.
meanings.sent1: The memorability of the song made it a hit among listeners.
meanings.sent2: The memorability of the event ensured it would be talked about for years to come.
meanings.sent3: The memorability of the joke had everyone laughing long after it was told.
meanings.sent4: The memorability of her smile was like a beacon in his memory.
meanings.sent5: The memorability of the sunset painted a lasting image in her mind.

meanings.definition: The ability to be memorable or leave a lasting impression.
meanings.sent1: The memorability of his speech captivated the audience.
meanings.sent2: The memorability of the movie made it a classic in cinema history.
meanings.sent3: The memorability of the dish was so strong, he kept craving it.
meanings.sent4: The memorability of her words echoed in his mind like a haunting melody.
meanings.sent5: The memorability of the painting left an indelible mark on her soul.
